author: Darrell Etherington
title: Scanwell begins 1,000 person study for at-home antibody test for COVID-19
description: At-home antibody testing for COVID-19 is the subject of ample debate among the scientific and medical community, with some seeing it as a necessary step in the process of selectively re-opening parts of the economy through verification of individuals with imm…
